<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game2 name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns selection damage. Same as [[getHitPointDamage]], only the argument is selection part instead of hit point.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Some part names are in Czech; see [[Translations|translation table]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[getHit]] selection </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be queried </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> selection: [[String]] - selection part name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] was return when invalid ''selection'' was given) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[getHit]] "head";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_car [[getHit]] "motor";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setHit]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHitPointDamage]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]], [[getHitIndex]], [[setHitIndex]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
